title: Working on a Tripkodoo business plan tonight
html:
Your company name:

Tripkodoo

Your company product:

opml-based collaborative document editing via microformats

Oh, hell. It looks like Web Two Point Oh! has nailed me on one of my stewing projects, Micronian. Sorta. Minus the OPML, really.

Though, hey, Tripkodoo sounds like a cool name...
body:
Your company name:
Tripkodoo
Your company product:
opml-based collaborative document editing via microformats
Oh, hell. It looks like [Web Two Point Oh!][w2] has nailed me on one of my stewing projects, [Micronian][m]. Sorta. Minus the OPML, really. *Though, hey, Tripkodoo sounds like a cool name...* [w2]: http://andrewwooldridge.com/myapps/webtwopointoh.html [m]: http://decafbad.com/trac/wiki/Micronian
